sentences.sentence: I am well aware that in saying this I shall outrage a few susceptibilities.
sentences.translation: 我十分清楚这样说会戳到一些人的痛处。

sentences.sentence: It was all carried out without any consideration for the susceptibilities of the bereaved family.
sentences.translation: 这样做全然没有考虑到死者家人的感受。

sentences.sentence: We must avoid wounding their susceptibilities.
sentences.translation: 我们必须避免伤害他们的感情。
